source.name: Pesticide Data Program 1997
source.description: The USDA Pesticide Data Program (PDP) database provides national data on pesticide residues in food and water, with an emphasis on foods consumed by infants and children.  PDP data are used primarily by EPA to prepare realistic pesticide dietary exposures for pesticide registration activities.  Data for each calendar-year survey are stored in a separate dataset.
